posts.title: Teeth Whitening Accelerator Kit
posts.content: Cut out that greedy licensed middle man you call a dentist and take matters into your own hands by improving your smile using the teeth whitening kit. The kit will take years worth of stains off without causing any added sensitivity to your precious chompers.

posts.title: Steering Wheel Tray
posts.content: Transform your car into an impromptu dining room using nothing more than this steering wheel tray. Made from durable abs plastic, the table features a handy cup holder, pen slot, and a sizable flat surface ideal for eating or working on.

posts.title: Flying Radio Control Shark
posts.content: Wreck havoc on land dwellers with this frightening realistic flying radio control shark! Using refillable helium to achieve flight, the shark’s back fin comes to life and gives a surprisingly realistic appearance to anyone caught in this deadly beast’s way.

posts.title: Deep Sleep Pillow Spray
posts.content: Fall into a soothing and relaxing sleep faster than ever before with help from this deep sleep pillow spray. Just a few spritzes of this clinically proven spray is all you’ll need to fall asleep faster and wake up feeling more refreshed than ever.

posts.title: Reusable/Washable Bamboo Paper Towels
posts.content: Do your part for the environment on a daily basis by switching to these reusable/washable bamboo paper towels. These cost-efficient towels are durable, super absorbent, and can be machine washed up to one hundred times.

posts.title: Gravity Self-Powered LED Lamp
posts.content: Get instant lighting wherever and whenever you need it by turning to the gravity self-powered LED lamp. Simply fill the provided bag with up to 26 lbs. of weight and pull the cord to winch up the bag and watch as it creates 20 minutes of light on its way down.

posts.title: The Perfect Temperature Pillow
posts.content: Sleep more comfortably than ever before by keeping your body at the ideal temp using the perfect temperature pillow. The pillow is made with specialized beads that can absorb or release heat depending on your body’s mean temperature.

posts.title: Modular NERF Gun
posts.content: Become the ultimate playground soldier by building the weapon of your dreams using this modular NERF gun. The motorized NERF Modulus ECS-10’s flexible base lets you choose from thirty different gun attachments, such as a chainsaw and a blast shield.

posts.title: Mini Tool Pen
posts.content: Mininch is the mini tool pen that should be in everyone’s everyday carry. Crafted from aircraft grade aluminum, it features a slim and compact design that fits comfortably in your pocket and comes with 16 varied bits containing everything from flathead bits to square and star bits.

posts.title: Wood Burning Hot Tub
posts.content: Stay nice and toasty on a chilly day by relaxing in the wood burning hot tub. The simple yet efficient design comfortably accommodates you and your significant other as a small wood burning fire pit keeps the water hot without the need for electricity.

posts.title: Crap Taxidermy Book
posts.content: Have a laugh looking through failed works inside the pages of this Crap Taxidermy book. This nightmare inducing work of art showcases some of the most spectacularly atrocious attempts at taxidermy ever attempted by man.

posts.title: Swirling Mercury Watch
posts.content: Place a new spin on the way you tell time with the swirling mercury watch. Instead of a standard analog display, the watch utilizes two brightly colored bands that continuously spin around to indicate the hour and minute in a simple and unique way.
